title: Open Your Ears
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Can’t get you off my mind
Look at me and you will find
Time after time it seems
I’ll say what I don’t mean
In your world we were the same
In mine now you’re the one to blame
You can’t remember my name
We’re lost, it’s such a shame
[Hook]
Listen to me
Stop making me see
What I’ve been waiting for
Listen to me
Stop making me see
[Verse 2]
I’m strong yet proud
I’m quiet yet loud
And I’m everything
You want in me
I’m small yet tall
I have it all
And I’m everything
You want me to be

[Hook]
Listen to me
Stop making me see
What I’ve been waiting for
Listen to me
Stop making me see
[Verse 3]
And I still feel like
I need you still
And I still feel like
I’m on some pill
And I still feel like
I need you still
[Hook]
Listen to me
Stop making me see
What I’ve been waiting for
Listen to me
Making me see
